DOC.brief_summary: The investigator aim evaluate retrospective study performance Swiss Emergency Triage Scale identify door Emergency Department patient require emergent intervention .
DOC.detailed_description: All patient triaged door Emergency Department use Swiss Emergency Triage Scale . Patients abdominal pain may triaged two different emergency level ( level 2 : medical evaluation within 20 minute , level 3 : medical evaluation within 2 hour ) . These level determine use set specific criterion . The aim study evaluate validity specific criterion order identify promptly patient abdominal pain require emergent intervention stay Emergency Department .
